info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 4:26PM CDT until May 02 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR EASTERN LAUDERDALE...NORTHWESTERN LIMESTONE...EAST CENTRAL COLBERT AND NORTHERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rogersville, or 19 miles east of Muscle Shoals, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rogersville, Town Creek, Lexington, Courtland, North Courtland, Anderson, Good Springs, Cartwright, Coxey and Oliver. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
